entry.title: New release for Melody Auth: v1.2.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix admin panel build warning on i18.ts by @stonecobra in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/259
  • Update i18n.ts file location based on latest package requirement by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/263
  • Support passwordless sign-in by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/264
  • Refactor server locale config, split into message config and locale tool in pages by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/265
  • Exposure userInfo directly from react-sdk and use in admin-panel by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/266
  • Split server views to independent components and add unit tests by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/267

New Contributors

  • @stonecobra made their first contribution in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/259

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/compare/v1.2.1...v1.2.2

entry.title: New release for Melody Auth: v1.2.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Add doc for how to manage multiple Cloudflare remote envs by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/268
  • Add basic log middleware with info log level by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/269
  • Support get users by org id in s2s api and admin-panel by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/271
  • Handle org slug change and org delete when there are org users properly by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/272
  • Add instructions to update the redirectUri values by @raph in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/270
  • Add error level logger by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/273
  • Add warn level logger by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/275
  • Increase server test coverage by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/276
  • Increase test coverage for server view files by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/277

New Contributors

  • @raph made their first contribution in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/270

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/compare/v1.2.2...v1.2.3

entry.title: New release for Melody Auth: v1.2.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix passkey feature on mobile device by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/286
  • Support discord sign-in by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/287
  • Support login with standard oidc auth providers by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/288
  • Secure OIDC signin with jwks endpoint by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/289
  • Support Apple sign-in by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/290
  • Fix sign up with names that are not in binary string by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/291
  • Allow load user email with discord sign-in by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/292

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/compare/v1.2.4...v1.2.5

entry.title: New release for Melody Auth: v1.2.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Require email scope from discord by default by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/293
  • Add loading state to action buttons on identity pages by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/294
  • Fully authorized token should bypass unexpected mfa changes by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/295
  • Avoid frontend infinitely redirecting when unexpected server error occurs by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/296
  • Disable email field after load passkey info by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/297
  • Move sms country code config to configs/variable by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/298
  • Add doc for how to customize branding by @byn9826 in https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/pull/299

Full Changelog: https://github.com/ValueMelody/melody-auth/compare/v1.2.5...v1.2.6
